title: Northern trails. Pts 1 and 2
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Norway - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Norway - Social life and customs
description: Silent film with English sub-text. Travelogue of Norway including footage of Stavanger, winding mountains and valleys and the amazing roads which travel through them; cattle farming in remote mountainous areas; Alesund - famous for its fishing and surrounded by many beautiful lakes and snow-capped mountains; glaciers; fjords; passenger steamers travelling from village to village and local peasants in traditional costume at work and at play.
